line.originaltext: 3/4 cup butter, divided
2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided
4 portobello mushroom caps, sliced
1 clove garlic, chopped
3/4 cup all-purpose flour, divided
1 (14.5 ounce) can beef broth
1/2 cup dry Marsala wine
kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
line.annotation: create_ing(ing7, "kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon browning sauce
6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/2 inch thickness
line.annotation: create_ing(ing9, "6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/2 inch thickness")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Melt 1/2 cup butter and heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Melt 1/2 cup butter and heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
line.annotation: separate(ing0, ing10, "1/2 cup butter", ing11, "1/4 cup butter", "")

line.originaltext: Melt 1/2 cup butter and heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
line.annotation: separate(ing1, ing12, "1 tablespoon veggie oil", ing13, "1 tablespoon veggie oil", "")

line.originaltext: Melt 1/2 cup butter and heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Melt 1/2 cup butter and heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing14, t1, ing15, "melted butter and hot oil", "over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Cook and stir the mushroom slices in the skillet until tender.
Remove from heat, cover to keep warm, and set aside.
Melt the remaining butter and heat the remaining oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
Melt the remaining butter and heat the remaining oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
Melt the remaining butter and heat the remaining oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing17, t2, ing18, "hot oil and melted butter", "over medium-high heat")

line.originaltext: Cook and stir the garlic until tender, then gradually whisk in the flour.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing3}, ing19, "oily garlic", "until garlic is tender")

line.originaltext: Cook and stir the garlic until tender, then gradually whisk in the flour.
line.annotation: separate(ing4, ing20, "1/2 cup flour", ing21, "1/4 cup flour", "")

line.originaltext: Cook and stir the garlic until tender, then gradually whisk in the flour.
line.annotation: combine({ing19, ing20}, ing22, "floured garlic", "gradually whisk in flour")

line.originaltext: Increase heat to high, and pour in the beef broth and Marsala wine.
line.annotation: combine({ing22, ing5, ing6}, ing23, "wine, broth, and floured garlic", "increase heat to high")

line.originaltext: Season with kosher salt and pepper, and whisk in the browning sauce.
line.annotation: combine({ing23, ing7, ing8}, ing24, "sauce, wine, broth, garlic", "whisk in browining sauce")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low.
line.annotation: cook(ing24, t2, ing25, "boiled sauce", "boil and reduce to low heat")

line.originaltext: Mix in the mushrooms, reserving remaining butter and oil in the skillet.
Cover saucepan, remove from heat, and set aside.
Season chicken with salt and pepper, and dredge in the remaining flour.
line.annotation: combine({ing21, ing9}, ing27, "dredged chicken", "add salt and pepper to taste")

line.originaltext: Cook the chicken 2 minutes per side, until browned.
line.annotation: cook(ing27, t1, ing28, "browned chicken", "brown, about 2 minutes per side")

line.originaltext: Arrange the chicken in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish, and cover with the sauce and mushroom mixture.
Arrange the chicken in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish, and cover with the sauce and mushroom mixture.
Arrange the chicken in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish, and cover with the sauce and mushroom mixture.
Cover baking dish, and bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken juices run clear.
line.annotation: cook(ing29, t0, ing30, "baked chicken", "for 25 minutes or until chicken juices run clear")

line.originaltext: Cover baking dish, and bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken juices run clear.
